snippet: The only surviving draft of the preliminary Emancipation Proclamation in Abraham Lincoln's handwriting will be displayed in an exhibition that will travel to several New York state museums.
abstract: The only surviving draft of the preliminary Emancipation Proclamation in Abraham Lincoln's handwriting will be displayed in an exhibition that will travel to several New York state museums.

headline.main: Lincoln's Handwitten Draft of the Emancipation Proclamation Is Coming to Harlem

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture
